TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit X509Certificate2 extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate

summary.span: 代表 X.509 憑證。

span.span: Represents an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在國際標準組織 (ISO) 工作群組中產生 X.509 結構。The X.509 structure originated in the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) working groups. 這個結構可以用來代表不同類型的資訊包括識別、 權限，以及持有者的屬性 （權限、 年齡、 性別、 位置、 關係，等等）。This structure can be used to represent various types of information including identity, entitlement, and holder attributes (permissions, age, sex, location, affiliation, and so forth). 雖然 ISO 規格本身，在結構上的資訊最多類別主要用來建立模型網際網路工程任務推動小組 (IETF) 公開金鑰基礎結構，X.509 (PKIX 所發出的規格中定義的使用案例) 工作群組。Although the ISO specifications are most informative on the structure itself, the class is designed to model the usage scenarios defined in specifications issued by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) Public Key Infrastructure, X.509 (PKIX) working group. 資訊的這些規格是 RFC 3280"[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」The most informative of these specifications is RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作介面。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 以目標應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及更新版本、類別未實作介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件來加密和解密檔案。The following example demonstrates how to use an object to encrypt and decrypt a file. [!code-csharp[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下列範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立空物件，與不同的其他建構函式這個類別使用的位元組陣列、 指標或憑證檔案的憑證資訊。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from a byte array, a pointer, or a certificate file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，然後允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新使用位元組陣列中的憑證資訊的物件。This constructor creates a new object using certificate information from a byte array. 編碼的二進位 (DER) 或 Base64 編碼 X.509 資料，可以是位元組陣列。The byte array can be binary (DER) encoded or Base64-encoded X.509 data. 位元組陣列也可以是 PKCS7 (Authenticode) 已簽署檔案。簽章者憑證用來建立物件。The byte array can also be a PKCS7 (Authenticode) signed file; the signer certificate is used to create the object. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`、簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

Docs.exception:
此憑證發生錯誤。
An error with the certificate occurs.
例如:
For example:
- 憑證檔案不存在。The certificate file does not exist.
- 憑證無效。The certificate is invalid.
- 此憑證的密碼不正確。The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件控制代碼使用適用於 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 的憑證內容， `PCCERT_CONTEXT`。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. 請注意，這個建構函式的立即呼叫端需要 unmanaged 程式碼權限。Note that the immediate caller of this constructor requires unmanaged code permission. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建構函式會建立憑證內容的複本。The constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 不會假設您傳遞至建構函式的內容結構是有效的。都已釋放。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 您可以取得一份目前`PCCERT_CONTEXT`結構從屬性，但是它是有效的存留期間只物件。You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼將私密金鑰解密，並將它儲存到金鑰容器。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`、簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件使用的位元組陣列和密碼所需存取憑證資料。This constructor creates a new object using a byte array and a password that is needed to access the certificate data. 它搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。It is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼將私密金鑰解密，並將它儲存到金鑰容器。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`、簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件使用憑證的檔案名稱和密碼，才能存取憑證。This constructor creates a new object using a certificate file name and a password needed to access the certificate. 它搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。It is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼將私密金鑰解密，並將它儲存到金鑰容器。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a key container. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`fileName`、簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `fileName`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

Docs.exception:
此憑證發生錯誤。
An error with the certificate occurs.
例如:
For example:
- 憑證檔案不存在。The certificate file does not exist.
- 憑證無效。The certificate is invalid.
- 此憑證的密碼不正確。The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會搭配 PKCS12 (PFX) 檔案包含憑證的私密金鑰。This constructor is used with PKCS12 (PFX) files that contain the certificate's private key. 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼將私密金鑰解密，並將它儲存至 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`、簽署存放區的憑證，而不是任何憑證存放區中建立。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

- 憑證無效。The certificate is invalid.
- 此憑證的密碼不正確。The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設定只在存放區相關聯的憑證。This property is set only on a certificate that is associated with a store. 如果此屬性設定，而且憑證會新增至憑證存放區，值會保存。If the property is set and the certificate is added to a certificate store, the value is persisted. 如果屬性設定在從存放區擷取憑證，就會立即保存值。If the property is set on a certificate retrieved from a store, the value is persisted immediately. X.509 存放區中封存的憑證不會包含在傳回物件除非屬性設定為`true`。In an X.509 store, archived certificates are not included in the returned object unless the property is set to `true`. 發生任何實體的封存活動時值是設定或取消。No physical archival activity occurs when the value is set or unset. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，然後允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks X.509 v3 憑證格式中定義的延伸可讓要包含在憑證的其他資料。The extensions defined in the X.509 v3 certificate format allow additional data to be included in the certificate. 許多擴充功能會由 ISO X.509 v3 定義中以及在 RFC 3280 PKIX"[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」A number of extensions are defined by ISO in the X.509 v3 definition as well as by PKIX in RFC 3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." 常見的延伸模組包含金鑰使用方式的相關資訊 ()，索引鍵識別項 ()，憑證原則、 撤銷資訊 （CRL 發佈點延伸模組） 和其他用途。Common extensions include information regarding key usage (), key identifiers (), certificate policies, revocation information (CRL Distribution Point extension), and other uses. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，然後允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 好記的名稱是您可以將 X.509 憑證存放區中的屬性。Friendly names are properties in the X.509 certificate store that can be set. 它們可用來讓使用者別名與憑證產生關聯，這樣可以輕易地辨識它們。They are used to enable a user to associate aliases with certificates so they can be easily identified. 如果沒有好記的名稱存在憑證，也就是空字串 ("") 會傳回。If no friendly name exists for the certificate, an empty string ("") is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法應該永遠可用而非剖析憑證，因為許多名稱值可以位於多個位置。This method should always be used instead of parsing the certificate, since many of the name values can be located in multiple locations. 使用此方法可確保會傳回適當的名稱。Using this method ensures that the appropriate name is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，然後允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來取得 X.509 憑證的未經處理位元組陣列，並填入及其相關值的物件。This method can be used to take a raw byte array of an X.509 certificate and populate the object with its associated values. 這個方法會接受位元組陣列，因為它可以只能用於不需要密碼，包括 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。Since this method accepts only a byte array, it can be used only for certificate types that do not require a password, including a Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificate or a PFX/PKCS12 certificate. 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用憑證檔案，例如檔案副檔名為.cer，代表 X.509 憑證，並於其中填入檔案包含的憑證物件。This method uses a certificate file, such as a file with a .cer extension, that represents an X.509 certificate and populates the object with the certificate the file contains. 這個方法可以搭配數個憑證類型，包括 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證 PFX/PKCS12 憑證，例如 Authenticode 簽章者憑證。This method can be used with several certificate types, including Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, PFX/PKCS12 certificates, and signer certificates such as Authenticode. 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，例如 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。You can use this method for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates, or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來填入物件使用的位元組陣列所表示的憑證的密碼。This method can be used to populate an object using a password for the certificate represented by the byte array. 值可以用來控制何處以及如何匯入私用金鑰。The value can be used to control where and how to import the private key. 這個方法會接受位元組陣列，並可用於例如 Base64 編碼或 DER 編碼的 X.509 憑證或 PFX/PKCS12 憑證的憑證類型。This method accepts a byte array and can be used for certificate types such as Base64-encoded or DER-encoded X.509 certificates or PFX/PKCS12 certificates. 請注意/PKCS12 的 PFX 憑證可以包含多個憑證。Note that a PFX/PKCS12 certificate can contain more than one certificate. 在此情況下，會使用私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果找到沒有私密金鑰，會使用第一個憑證。In that case, the first certificate associated with a private key is used or, if no private key is found, the first certificate is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前此屬性支援只有 RSA 或 DSA 金鑰，因此它會傳回或物件。Currently this property supports only RSA or DSA keys, so it returns either an or a object. 如果沒有私密金鑰關聯的憑證，則它會傳回`null`。If no private key is associated with the certificate, it returns `null`. > [!WARNING] > 如果您將此屬性設定為`null`或另一個不先刪除它的金鑰，磁碟上遺留私密金鑰檔案。If you set this property to `null` or to another key without first deleting it, a private key file is left on the disk. 若要正確地刪除此屬性相關聯的私密金鑰，請設定`PersistKeyInCsp`至`false`，然後呼叫方法。To properly delete the private key associated with this property, set `PersistKeyInCsp` to `false`, and then call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，然後允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. summary.span: 取得憑證的指模。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指紋使用 SHA1 演算法以動態方式產生，並不是實際存在於憑證。The thumbprint is dynamically generated using the SHA1 algorithm and does not physically exist in the certificate. 由於指紋是憑證的唯一值，它通常用於在憑證存放區中尋找特定的憑證。Since the thumbprint is a unique value for the certificate, it is commonly used to find a particular certificate in a certificate store. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. summary.span: 使用基本驗證原則，執行 X.509 鏈結驗證。

span.span: Performs a X.509 chain validation using basic validation policy.

returns.span: 如果驗證成功，則為 ，如果驗證失敗則為 。

span.span: if the validation succeeds; if the validation fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會建立簡單的憑證鏈結，而且基底的原則套用至該鏈結。This method builds a simple chain for the certificate and applies the base policy to that chain. 如果您需要有關失敗的詳細資訊，請驗證直接使用的憑證物件。If you need more information about a failure, validate the certificate directly using the object. 請注意，鏈結引擎的預設值會覆寫使用類別。Note that the default chaining engine can be overridden using the class. Microsoft Windows Server 2003，預設的引擎是否符合規格述 RFC3280，"[憑證和憑證撤銷清單 (CRL) 設定檔](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)。 」On Microsoft Windows Server 2003, the default engine conforms to the specification described in RFC3280, "[Certificate and Certificate Revocation List (CRL) Profile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=45286)." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，然後允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console.
